title: Bobby Almost Got Hacked! + Amy’s Son Wants An Unusual Pet + Bobby Awards The 'Employee Of The Month'!
itunes:title: Bobby Almost Got Hacked! + Amy’s Son Wants An Unusual Pet + Bobby Awards The 'Employee Of The Month'!
description:
Bobby reveals a scam that almost got him on Instagram. Proof that you have to be alert with everything online even when it seems legit! Amy also shares her story about how she thinks someone tried to steal her identity over the weekend. Amy tells us the pet that her son wants and now she is looking into…we can’t believe it! Per listener request…Bobby reveals the latest Bobby Bones Show 'Employee of the Month'!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
